item.description:
Hey Salsa Fans:

Join me for a fun evening of dancing in the park in the South End. The evening includes Free dancing, and free lessons from 6-9pm.

Visit www.metamovements.com/sitp for more details.

The event occurs every Monday between the dates below but I (Angel) will be there on the 28th to hang out with the meet-up. Feel free to attend anytime for a night of fun and dancing.

Start Dates of the Event:
From: Monday, June 21, 2010 at 6:00 pm- 9:00 pm
To: Monday, August 23, 2010 at 6:00 pm - 9:00 pm
Location: Between Shawmut and Washington Boston, MA 02118



AND !!!!!!!

Volunteers are Needed!!!!!!

Volunteers are needed to make Salsa in the Park a success! Interested in getting involved? Volunteer duties include:
- Selling snacks at the event
- Taking photos of people dancing
- Assisting with classes
- Dancing with new-comers

Please help us make this event the best it can be. For more information or to sign up email Metamovementsdance@gmail.com
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a Fedora Hat. Shouldn't be hard to find.

group.name: The Boston & Cambridge Salsa Meetup Group

item.name: Salsa In the Park Is BACK!!
